byline.original: By YAMICHE ALCINDOR and ALAN RAPPEPORT

abstract: Mr. Sanders, under pressure from the Clinton campaign to explain how he would pay for his progressive policies, unveiled a universal healthcare plan on Sunday night that includes sweeping tax increases and a drastic tax hike for the wealthiest.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Releases Details on Health Plan That Would Raise Taxes but, He Argues, Save on Costs
headline.print_headline: Sanders’s Health Plan Would Raise Taxes but, He Argues, Save on Costs for Care

snippet: Mr. Sanders, under pressure from the Clinton campaign to explain how he would pay for his progressive policies, unveiled a universal healthcare plan on Sunday night that includes sweeping tax increases and a drastic tax hike for the wealthiest.
